message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of the inflation. How about we compromise?
Inflation is eating into my share, I need a bit more to compensate.
This is my final offer. I'm not going to budge any further. It's better than nothing, right?
